entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -28.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -28.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -31.9°C
Wind: NW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
